subject: Plus x pedal issue
description_text:
Hello, I ordered the above pedals about a month ago from your ebay store.
They have been working great until today. I attempted to calibrate them
today within the Simsonn manager software and when I open the manager, I am
getting a warning which states "You may be the victim of pirated software."
The pedals are showing as connected within the software but are not
registering any inputs or allowing me to calibrate or adjust anything. I
tried reinstalling the manager application and checked all power and usb
connections to the pedals.

Thank you for any help in resolving this issue.

conversations.body_text: Hello, you can contact eBay's after-sales service directly.  â€‹
